description.message: Distill and display only the important content to enjoy a more focused reading experience

options_introduction.message: Here you'll find two options that change the appearance of distilled pages.
options_introduction.description: Acts as filler text so the options page works as a preview

options_theme_description.message: Themes change the color of the background and the text. There are three different colors to choose from: light, dark and sepia

options_font_description.message: You also have the option to change fonts. Three different fonts are available for your choosing: sans serif, serif and monospace

options_shortcut_description.message: If you prefer to activate the extension using your keyboard you may be interested in setting a keyboard shortcut. To access shortcuts for all extensions, click "Keyboard shortcuts" at the bottom of the list of extensions.
